section TITLE
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/09-02-2020-1008.5310v2.DFT_calculations_of_point_defects_on_UN_001_surface.pdf.json
DFT O
calculations O
of O
point O
defects O
on O
UN B-MATERIAL
( I-MATERIAL
001 I-MATERIAL
) O
surface O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/09-02-2020-1008.5310v2.DFT_calculations_of_point_defects_on_UN_001_surface.pdf.json
The O
density O
functional O
theory O
is O
used O
in O
a O
study O
of O
point O
defects O
on O
both O
UN B-MATERIAL
( I-MATERIAL
001 I-MATERIAL
) O
surface O
and O
sub O
- O
surface O
layers O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/09-02-2020-1008.5310v2.DFT_calculations_of_point_defects_on_UN_001_surface.pdf.json
We O
compare O
the O
results O
for O
slabs O
of O
different O
thicknesses O
( O
both O
perfect O
and O
containing O
nitrogen O
or O
uranium O
vacancies O
) O
with O
a O
full O
geometry O
, O
electronic O
and O
spin O
density O
optimization O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/29-01-2020-part1-1608.01885v1.Density_functional_theory_calculations_of_the_stress_of_oxidised_110_silicon_surfaces.pdf.json

measurement O
of O
the O
lattice O
- O
parameter O
of O

- O

of O

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/18-09-2019-paper-13.pdf.json

. O

id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/28-10-2019-12-10.pdf.json

have O
considered O

- O

id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/18-09-2019-paper-10.pdf.json

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/18-09-2019-paper-10.pdf.json

. O

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/18-09-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
In O
the O
scalar O
- O
relativistic O
case O
, O
due O
to O
strong O
nesting O
between O
the O
flat O
sheets O
of O
the O
Fermi O
surface O
and O
the O
presence O
of O
a O
large O
Kohn O
anomaly O
, O
electron O
- O
phonon O
interaction O
is O
enhanced O
in O
the O
vicinity O
of O
the O
A O
point O
in O
the O
Brillouin O
zone O
. O

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/18-09-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
This O
enhancement O
of O
the O
electron O
- O
phonon O
interaction O
has O
a O
two O
- O
dimensional O
character O
, O
as O
electrons O
from O
the O
flat O
parts O
of O
the O
FS O
are O
strongly O
coupled O
to O
phonons O
, O

in O

- O

, O
which O

of O
atoms O
from O
the O
Ca O
- O
Bi O
( O
1 O
) O
layers O
. O

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/18-09-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
When O
SOC O
is O
included O
, O
however O
, O
due O
to O
the O
change O
in O
the O
Fermi O
surface O
topology O

nesting O
becomes O
weaker O
, O
and O
the O
electron O
- O
phonon O
coupling O
becomes O
more O
isotropic O
and O
less O
ω O
dependent O
. O

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/18-09-2019-paper-10.pdf.json

a O

- O

0 O

= O

. O

a O

to O
the O
related O
ABi3 O
superconductors O
. O

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/18-09-2019-paper-10.pdf.json

critical O
temperature O
, O

- O

= O
1 O
. O
3 O
K O
. O

experimental O

, O

2 O
. O
0 O

. O

. O

id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/18-09-2019-paper-10.pdf.json

. O

. O

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/01-01-2020-9.pdf.json
@DOI O
: O
10 O
. O
1063/1 O
. O
1687232# O
I O
. O
INTRODUCTION O
Half O
- O
metallic O
ferromagnets O
( O
HMFs O
) O
, O
i O
. O
e O
. O
, O
where O
one O

with O
a O
gap O
at O

have O

of O

. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/04-09-2019-paper-34.pdf.json
The O
field O
- O
induced O
changes O
in O
the O
surface O
interlayer O
spacings O
and O
bucklings O
have O
been O
calculated O
using O
a O
first O
- O
principles O
ultrasoft O
- O
pseudopotential O
approach O
, O
and O
the O
change O
of O
the O
polarization O
and O
the O
ferroelectric O
distortions O
in O
the O
surface O
layers O
have O
been O
obtained O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/04-09-2019-paper-34.pdf.json
The O
surfaces O
are O
represented O
by O
periodically O
repeated O
slabs O
, O
and O
an O
external O
dipole O
layer O
is O
included O
in O
the O
vacuum O
region O
of O
the O
supercells O
to O
control O
the O
electric O
field O
normal O
to O
the O
surfaces O
. O

id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/04-09-2019-paper-34.pdf.json

influence O
of O
the O
electrical O
boundary O
conditions O
on O
the O
ferroelectric O
properties O
of O
the O
slabs O
is O
discussed O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/04-09-2019-paper-34.pdf.json

the O
case O
of O
a O
vanishing O
internal O

field O
, O

study O
indicates O
that O
even O
very O
thin O
slabs O
can O
show O
a O

instability O
. O

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/28-09-2019-10a.pdf.json

compounds O
are O

intermetallic O
compounds O
that O
have O
the O
general O
composition O
X2YZ O
. O

Results O
and O
discussion O
Our O

procedure O
in O
this O
work O
is O
to O

Introduction O

and O

site O
in O
Ni O
MnGa O
with O
small O
to O
substantial O
degree O

important O

of O
shape O

alloys O
( O

phase O

symmetry O
. O

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/19-01-2019-paper-30.pdf.json

shape O
memory O
alloys O
( O
MSMAs O
) O
are O

to O
be O

important O
following O

10% O
magnetic O

( O

in O

phase O
of O

[1–3] O
, O

4% O

in O

phase O

[6] O
. O

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/19-01-2019-paper-30.pdf.json

to O
the O
transition O
from O
the O
in O
- O
plane O
oxygen O
2p O
bands O
to O
the O
t2g O
and O
dx2-y2 O
orbitals O
near O
2 O
. O
0 O
eV O
, O
which O
corresponds O
to O
the O
second O
peak O
in O
the O
experimental O
spectrum O
. O

section 3
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/26-08-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
When O
E O
c O
, O
the O
transition O
from O
the O
apical O
oxygen O
2p O
bands O
to O
the O
Mn O
empty O
d3z2-r2 O
orbital O
contributes O
most O
of O
the O
peaks O
around O
2 O
. O
75 O
eV O
and O
3 O
. O
75 O
eV O
in O
the O
calculated O
spectrum O
. O

section 4
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/26-08-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
For O
a O
series O
of O
layered O
perovskites O
Sr2MO4 B-MATERIAL
M O
=Ti O
, O
V O
, O
Cr O
, O
and O
Mn O
, O
their O
electronic O
structures O
and O
the O
optical O
conductivity O
spectra O
are O
studied O
by O
first O
- O
principles O
calculations O
within O
the O
GGA B-METHOD
and O
GGA+U B-METHOD
. O
The O
GGA B-METHOD
calculation O
could O
successfully O
predict O
the O
ground O
state O
for O
M O
=Ti O
and O
Mn O
, O
but O
failed O
for O
M O
=V O
and O
Cr O
. O

section 4
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/26-08-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
In O
these O
two O
strongly O
correlated O
t2g O
systems O
, O
GGA+U B-METHOD
calculations O
show O
that O
the O
AFM O
- O
II O
state O
will O
have O
the O
lowest O
total O
energy O
when O
U O
is O
larger O
than O
a O
critical O
value O
Uc O
. O

section 4
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/26-08-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
But O
the O
optical O
conductivity O
spectra O
indicate O
that O
in O
both O
cases O
, O
Uc O
is O
overestimated O
. O

section 4
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/26-08-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
Analysis O
indicates O
that O
some O
cooperative O
changes O
in O
the O
ligand O
field O
such O
as O
JT O
or O
some O
other O
lattice O
distortions O
could O
reduce O
the O
Uc O
value O
. O

section 4
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/26-08-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
These O
changes O
in O
the O
electron O
- O
lattice O
interaction O
will O
induce O
further O
splitting O
of O
the O
degenerate O
t2g O
orbital O
just O
as O
U O
does O
, O
which O
is O
shown O
to O
be O
critical O
for O
the O
metal O
- O
insulator O
transition O
and O
stabilization O
of O
AFM O
- O
II O
configuration O
in O
these O
systems O
. O

section 4
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/26-08-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
In O
the O
M O
=V O
case O
, O
since O
the O
geometric O
structure O
in O
bulk O
or O
thin O
films O

distortion O
, O
such O
a O
kind O
of O
additional O
contribution O
from O
lattice O
distortion O
seems O
unlikely O
. O

section 4
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/test/26-08-2019-paper-10.pdf.json
In O
Sr2CrO4 O
, O

quite O
a O

deviation O
from O
tetragonal O
symmetry O
in O
samples O

distortion O
is O

in O

may O

are O

. O
